attributes.action: stop the closure of the dobb,s weir hoilday park hertfordshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the leevally hoilday park at dobb,s weir hertfordshire is to close due to the authority have given permission to a grave extraction.this closure effects 100 static caravan,s,which have to be removed by sept,there,s no compensation on offer for our van,s if we can,t move them else where.the site is used by touring van,s camper,s and tourist,s.if our van,s are still on site in sept the authority will take leagl action to remove them and have them crushed.some of these van,s are worth thousands of pound,s .the authority has known for two years of closure but were still selling vans up to end of the season last year.but never told the new owners that the site was to close.this closure will devastate this picturesque area.it will also have an effect on local shop,s pub,s and store,s etc due to the money spent in them during the hoilday season.so all caravaner,s camper,s touring van,s sign up to protect this popular venue.the leevally authority are now refusing to anwser emails from owner,s on the site.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
